inclusion.criterion: Patients must have recurrent GBM (Glioblastoma Multiforme)or Anaplastic Astrocytoma.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine.

inclusion.criterion: The diagnosis of GBM or Anaplastic Astrocytoma.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have been previously treated with surgical resection (any extent okay) and adjuvant radiation therapy plus temozolomide.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide 7 days on and 7 days off.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be at least 12 months from completion of radiation therapy.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has been previously treated with radiation, but no mention of time since treatment.

inclusion.criterion: At least 2 months from completion of temozolomide (to be consistent with the the 'rechallenge' group from Perry et al. JCO 2010).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status <2 (Karnofsky >60%, see appendix A).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: There must be measurable disease on MRI.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have normal organ and marrow function as defined below:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Temozolomide re-treatment is planned by the treating neuro-oncologist.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Must be able to receive an MRI.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not be receiving any other investigational cancer treatment agents at the time of enrollment.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has only mentioned standard treatments.

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not have previously failed treatment with salvage temozolomide.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not have previously failed treatment with a VEGF inhibitor.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has only mentioned standard treatments.

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not have previously been treated with >1 course of radiotherapy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not have previously been treated with radiosurgery to the brain.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has only mentioned standard treatments.

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant and breastfeeding women are excluded. Women of child-bearing potential who are unwilling or unable to use and acceptable method of birth control to avoid pregnancy for the entire study period and up to 12 weeks after the study are excluded.
exclusion.label: met

notes: ECOG performance status, organ and marrow function, previous treatment with salvage temozolomide or VEGF inhibitor, number of courses of radiotherapy, and radiosurgery to the brain are unknowns.
